评论详情: Great dress, flattering, stylish, true to size, but I cant get the smell out. Washed it several times, tried baking soda & vinegar, tried hanging it outside, tried scent beads, but it still smells like sulpher--which sucks, bc I really like it. For that reason, I dont recommend.
Perfect Thanksgiving dress. Received multiple complements when worn. True to size.
Happy with purchase. It does seem a little darker than the photos.
This dress isn’t nearly as cute as the pictures make it seem. The fabric is very thick and is not flattering at all.

评论概述: Very tight in bust would not close
评论详情: I loved dress & everything about it. I had return it could not close bust area Im about 5’5” 138 lbs And would have had wear open with tank top Did not want that wanted dress.
Kinda heavy very stylish
I love this dress!  It is so comfortable and fits me well.  The material is durable but flexible and soft.  I got a size large and I’m 5’2” and weigh 165

I bought this dress for fall and winter wear when I need a casual dress to wear with my cowboy boots. I was surprised by the quality of the dress although the material was a bit stiff like jeans can be when they are new. I washed it with fabric softener and now it is just right. Fit and cut are great for comfort. I am 5'1, under 120 pounds got the small, which was just fine. I felt the price was reasonable and this will be a go to outfit for going out on casual occasions.

It is A-Line, designed and sewn well, the sleeves are long enough for this long-armed gal, and the hem is long enough to cover well: I will wear with leggings as a full tunic top.  Very pretty fadey purple.  It is too tight across the chest, and I have just a normal bust size for my proportions: that's a design flaw.  Also, I wish the back were not tiered, but straight like the front.  It's a bit of gratuitous floofiness which detracts from the jean look, in my opinion. The material is on the heavy side--"durable."  I love the collar, where the seam hits under the bust, the button placket--just do mostly love this.

Wore this at 25 weeks pregnant for rodeo. Fit is chose small (usually small/medium). The medium was just too big on me. It wasn’t too thick or thin so perfect for spring in Texas. It was wrinkly but easy to iron out. I would use this dress again as it was easy to decorate and pair with cowgirl boots!

Very cute and fits really well. Babydoll look while still being work appropriate for a business casual office. Totally perfect for a 5.5 pregnant woman like myself! The smell isn't great but I'm hoping to get rid of it. I have another amazon denim purchase with the same issue so I hope to find a solution soon.
Very Thin Material…… Plus this item I received had 2 bad flaws in the material and one place in front of the dress was a small hole . Not good quality material at all …. Very disappointed customer

Great dress for fall. Quality fabric. I bought both the reef blue and the wishful blue selections. The reef blue looked and felt like a pair of broken in blue jeans. The wishful blue was a navy dress denim fabric. I’m 5’4”, 145 lbs, 36B and size medium fit me well.

I love the color and the material. It ran a little tighter than thought and so I need to wear a slimmer under it. Compliments on the look! I even pair it with light lavender leggings and boots in the fall.
This dress is amazing and so cute

Love the style.  I got a large. I'm 5'3" 165 lb and 38C. Runs large. A medium would be better. The fabric (I got the red.) Is stiff like new jeans. I've washed it one or two times a week for 6 months. It is some softer but is still stiffer than what I like. It just stands out a little stiff.

This dress is useful in the Spring and Fall given the long sleeves and fabric thickness. It’s probably too hot now for 80 degree and up weather but I know there’s a short sleeve option of this dress available as well.

For reference I am 5ft 2inch tall; 140 pounds and 36D. I purchased a M and it’s perfect. It’s a little snug on the bust but it does fit….i just don’t need to put on any inches in the chest area😜 I ordered the pink and it’s stunning with a faded denim look…very very pretty dress. Falls about 2inches above my knee so is perfect for day or night occasions. Quite thick material which adds to the quality feel of this dress. I love this so much I’m planning on buying other colors. Very nice dress and I highly recommend.
Looks just like the pictures, maybe even better.  The fit is perfect.  It can be worn alone, with leggings, with a cardigan.  It is perfect!
Cute style, the dress I received looked a little different than the picture but still super cute.
Was looking for a western outfit and this dress just wasn’t ment for big boobs
Such a great quality. Not stiff. Just perfect. I had a couple issues with the buttons being stiff. But once I got it buttoned there was no unbuttoning it lol. Definitely worth the $$$.
Love this denim dress! It’s very dark, I hope it fades a little more after washes. Lots of compliments!
Love it but don’t like the collar ….Very cute …
This dress is so cute.

Love this dress. Great comfy and cute dress I can wear teaching.
it’s supposed to be bigger and loose fitting, but even an extra small is huge.

评论概述: TTS and a good length. Great fall dress!
评论详情: This fits TTS. I am 160 lbs, 5’6 and I got a medium. Material (cotton/soft, NOT thick denim) is on the thinner side, so great for transitions between seasons. The length is great and I can wear it to work comfortably. It took a bit to get here, but it ships from overseas so that is to be expected. No weird smell or anything when it arrived. The color is only a tiny bit more washed out/lighter than pic. Order it!!
Ordered based on reviews and loved it. Good quality and nice weight. Well made.
Runs big but super cute and great quality.
I bought this dress because my sister had it and raves about it. It’s the perfect dress!  Washes well and looks so stylish!!
Returned this item. Not actual denim.
I love the dress but it’s very heavy material
Did not fit at all.  Proportionately wrong for me.  Fabric was  on the flimsy side.  Will return

This top is definitely a tunic or dress, it is almost to my knees, I am 5'6', 150 lb. I ordered two, the blue denim and white. It is true to size, I ordered a medium and normally wear 8-10, 36C. The gaps between buttons tend to gape open at bustline, the reason for my 4 stars instead of 5. I sewed mine along the button line to create a pullover instead, and I LOVE it (see picture of my seam line). The white is opaque, so no trouble with see-through issues, and so cute with denim leggings and flats or boots. Care instructions are important to follow, due to 100% cotton.

I wasn't sure what to expect but I am happy to say I am very happy with this dress!  It is comfortable, no too short so it can worn to work.  It will look great with tights and boots!  Well worth the money!
The fit is perfect and the material is on trend
This dress is great for the fall! I am 5’4/135lbs and the small fit great! It is longer in the back & feels like it’s good quality.
This is a cute dress. Great material but every single button was falling off and had to be sewn back on.
Loved this dress, just didn’t suit my body shape well. The chest part was a bit too tight and the body was just a bit too big. Great material, very sturdy, but soft denim.
Ordered the burnt orange- great fall color- it’s a nice weight denim- washed up well too. Love it with my cowgirl boots!
Exactly what I was looking for! Love the color and the fit. For reference I am 4’10 and 145 lbs and a medium fit perfect! Definitely recommend!
I have had so many compliments on this dress. I have the short sleeve version too. I love the denim look.
Very bright pink!! - brighter than pic shows. Washed out denim. Super fabric and comfortable. Great construction. Button cuffs. Generous size. Barbiecore. Will buy in more colors. Love it.

I ordered a large in this dress after reading some comments to size up. However, after receiving it, it was too big and immediately reordered in my original size, M. Fit perfectly! Great quality material and just felt so cute in this dress for a date night out!
I ordered this dress because it was cute. I sized up for comfort. It runs small in the breast area and the fabric is more suited for fall or winter.
horrible look....
In Love with this dress!

Very comfortable
I love this dress. It’s loose and short in the front, but very flattering. I’m a teacher, so I’ll wear leggings and boots for school.
I love this blouse.  You can wear it as is or wear a t shirt under it and leave it open.  A real find!
Thank me later
I love this dress. I have 38 DD boobs and I can't button the xxl size. It fits perfect every were else.
Super cute, loose fitting, comfortable. I wore it to a summer country concert with booties and it was perfect. I’m 5’9” and the length was perfect on me and not too short. I got an xs.

Update-6 months have passed and I have not donated this dress. It has grown on me. It is not a dress I would wear to a second dinner engagement but it is a dress I have worn to run errands without looking like a mess. I have received compliments on the dress each time I wear it. Maybe it looks better on than it feels? Surprisingly the buttons are still in tact as well is the color after several washes. Practicality is the theme of this dress for me. I needed this dress to wear to my husbands western dinner theme party. It was OK. The buttons were not sewed on very well and the material had a weird smell. I haven’t worn it again since February and probably will end up donating it. It serves the purpose for the western outfit with cowgirl boots but did not love to keep.
The length of this dress is too long for my 5’2 self. It is below my knees. I am returning it.
Quality is good. Size is perfect. The length is  about 2 inches above the knee in the front. I love it.
Good value for cost, excellent quality denim fabric, and good style. Very satisfied. I highly recommend this frayed hemline shirt.
Love this dress. It’s large so size down. Blooms out a little more than expected in the back but still very flattering.
It was heavy and stiff and it just felt like so much material.
I’m 53 165 and ordered a large, but it is very boxy and looks plus size. The dying of the material was uneven towards the bottom so I will be returning.
its perfect for everything! great length, great fabric, looks good with any shoes Ive tried!
dress was really cute but the size of the dress ran big. about a full size too big. order a size down

Loooove this dress! Looks fantastic with any kind of boot  from Uggs to cowboy boots!

I really love this denim dress! It fits true to size and washes up nicely while keeping its shape! The length is just at the knees and is appropriate to wear dressed down or dressed up. You’ll be glad you bought it!
I love the fit and style if this dress but it has an odor from the dye in the fabric. I will keep it though
Liked the color choices and in the picture it looks shorter.  I'm happy it fell right above my knee. I'm 5'4"  120lbs.  Lightweight demin for all seasons.  I bought a medium.
Cute but too tight in the chest and longer than expected. 5’5”, 165lbs, 36DD. Wanted to love but just don’t.
My wife looked amazing in the dress and got many compliments for it. Only thing that’d make it extra perfect for her were if it had pockets.

评论概述: Love the length and the material quality.
评论详情: I love this. I'm going to wear it open like a jacket with sleeveless tops. I have plenty of room with an x-large. I am 5' 8" and weight more than I'd like but this is flattering on me. Love the length. Good quality denim material. I was not crazy abt the sleeves but I just folded them up once. Perfect.  Do wish the stitching on the back was not there but I can live with that. Nice. I'm thinking of getting more colors b/c I like the fit and look so much.

This is the cutest dress and comfortable too!  I am 5'6" and it comes to the top of my knees.  I usually  wear a Large or Extra Large, and opted to get the Large in this, and so glad I didn't go larger... it fits perfectly!!

Comfort: Medium weight denim - as expected. (I wouldn't wear it when temps were above 60 or 70.) It's very comfortable. It looks and feel like 100% cotton, (although the tag says 15% polyester.)  Length: I am 5'5" and it hits slightly above my knees in the front and it's a little longer in the back.  Waistline: It isn't particularly flattering on my 5'5" 135 lb frame. It makes me look a little thick through the middle, but this is typical of a baby doll waistline. In the pictures I posted, it doesn't make me look thick when my arms are raised, but of course I don't always keep my arms raised! Lol. (It might be more flattering if all of the tiers were sewn into the front too. But, maybe not...)  Color: I bought several colors hoping to keep one or two. The Rocknight Blue is super cute. The pictures don't do it justice. I kept that one and the Vintage Black.  Overall, I recommend buying this dress!

I so badly wanted to love this, but you have to side up 1-2 sizes if you have any dimension to your chest or need any stretch at all. The arms as well run short. I can't wear it unless I unbutton the entire top and cuff the sleeves.

评论概述: NOT FOR PLUS SIZE WOMEN WITH BIG BREASTS!
评论详情: Dress is really well made and very cute! However, not for those with bigger than a large B cup. I wish this dress came bigger so I could tailor down the rest to fit my DDD cup. Very sad to have to send back!
This dress is super cute, however it runs small in the bust area.
Can be worn as is or with leggings or whatever you choose .. beautiful 😍

I purchased the white in small. For reference I’m 5’0 and 128 lbs. the dress was so cute but completely overwhelmed my frame. I’m short so going to my knees was expected, but it was large everywhere. I’m going to try the XS, which likely still be the relaxed fit I was hoping for without looking lost in it.

This dress was everything I hoped for! I ordered it to wear to a country music concert in early November and it did not disappoint. It felt like the perfect option for a fall concert. I paired it with pink suede cowboy boots and felt dainty yet badass all night. I would absolutely recommend!  Don’t be afraid to size down. The dress was a solid six inches above my knees in the front, but cut a little bit longer in the back. It was a very subtle sexy… and I loved it!
Love this dress! It is the perfect babydoll cut and is so comfy since it is a bit bigger. I wear it frequently and would recommend it to anyone
